function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Measurement error in the moisture content readings from the sensors","Impact":"Inaccurate moisture content measurements could lead to incorrect conclusions about the filter bed performance","Mitigation":"Calibrate and validate the accuracy of the sensors regularly, and cross-check readings with alternative moisture measurement methods","Technologies":"Calibration equipment, validation tools, alternative moisture measurement methods","People":"Research team, engineers, technicians","Owner":"Research team, engineers, technicians"},{"Description":"Inadequate filtration of toluene and formaldehyde due to low bed water content","Impact":"Higher concentrations of toluene and formaldehyde in the air outlet, posing health risks to occupants","Mitigation":"Maintain optimal bed water content to ensure effective filtration, establish monitoring protocols for bed water content levels","Technologies":"Moisture sensors, automated watering systems, monitoring and control systems","People":"Occupants, researchers, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, researchers, engineers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate contaminant concentration measurements at the inlet and outlet of the air cleaner","Impact":"Incorrect calculation of single pass efficiency, leading to misleading performance assessment of the filter bed","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of concentration measurement equipment, cross-referencing measurements with alternative methods","Technologies":"Calibration tools, validation equipment, alternative measurement methods","People":"Research team, engineers, technicians","Owner":"Research team, engineers, technicians"}]}
